opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: At&t Communications of the Southwest, Inc. v. Southwestern Bell Telephone Co.

opinion:
535 U.S. 1075

AT&T COMMUNICATIONS OF THE SOUTHWEST, INC.
v.
SOUTHWESTERN BELL TELEPHONE CO. ET AL.

No. 00-1689.

Supreme Court of the United States.

May 20, 2002.

1

C. A. 8th Cir. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Verizon Communications Inc. v. FCC, ante, p. 467. Reported below: 236 F. 3d 922.
